lead_paragraph: The conflicting boasts by Afghan and Pakistan militants over the suicide bombing could be used to raise money and attract recruits.
snippet: The conflicting boasts by Afghan and Pakistan militants over the suicide bombing could be used to raise money and attract recruits.

headline.main: Different Taliban Groups Claim Role in Afghanistan Bombing
headline.print_headline: Different Taliban Groups Claim Role in Bombing at C.I.A. Afghan Outpost

byline.contributor: Mark Mazzetti contributed reporting from Washington.
